title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, October 25, 2019
description: It’s the birthday of novelist Anne Tyler (1941), who said, "I want to live other lives. I've never quite believed that one chance is all I get.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday of novelist Anne Tyler (1941), who said, "I want to live other lives. I've never quite believed that one chance is all I get.”
